abstract: Retired Gen. Tommy R. Franks and retired Adm. Joseph W. Prueher have resigned from Bank of America’s board, bringing to seven the number of directors to leave since the bank’s shareholder meeting in April.
snippet: Retired Gen. Tommy R. Franks and retired Adm. Joseph W. Prueher have resigned from Bank of America’s board, bringing to seven the number of directors to leave since the bank’s shareholder meeting in April.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has lost its military might.

headline.main: Bank of America Loses Another 2 Directors
